title: Drawing, "Botanical Sketches, Colombia", 1853
markings: Watermark: Parts of the letters K and F.  Similar to -104.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top left:  2 Appear to be young / leaves of an indian red or / laky color these with the / green leaves and the white / flowers of a vine produce a pleasing effect; at top center: Tree; at top right: Tree with lilac / blossoms 2; at center: wild plantain; at bottom left:  Bank;  again at bottom right: 2 feathery seed.
description: Horizontal view showing details of leaves and vine at top; a tree at center and a tree with blossoms at top right; a plant at center; and a bank at bottom left; and seed at bottom right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Botanical Sketches, Colombia", 1853.
1853. Graphite on light gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-97.
